data.title: Ethereum Fusaka Will Be ‘The Most Bullish Upgrade’ Ever, Pundit Claims
data.description: A pseudonymous analyst has set off a new narrative around Ethereum’s upcoming Fusaka upgrade, arguing it could be the most favorable event ever for ETH as an asset by finally turning Layer-2 networks into meaningful ETH burners.On X, crypto pundit Kira Sama framed Fusaka, scheduled for December 3…
